mapper.update: update tbl_review set review_id = review_id - 1 where review_id > #{review_id}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_review where prd_id = #{prd_id} order by review_regdate
mapper.update: update tbl_review set review_hit = review_hit + 1 where review_id = #{review_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(review_id, prd_id, mem_id, review_subject, review_content, review_img) values((select nvl(max(review_id)+1,1) from tbl_review), #{prd_id}, #{mem_id}, #{review_subject}, #{review_content}, #{review_img})
